name: One Night at Bob's
description:
This game is a port of my scratch game!

One Night at Bob's is a fnaf inspired horror game funny game where people named bob, bill, and billy try to hunt you make you laugh! No but seriously one night at bobs is weird fun! Bob and his friends try to kill you make you have a good experience!

"This is so weird fun!" (this is my first itch game so give me some feedback please, also please read "read me" for reasons and some context)
